about.title: Financial software engineer and full-stack developer. Values communication and collaboration, based in Naju, Korea ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡·
about.description: Currently working on various projects, focusing on web accessibility and performance optimization. My goal is to provide practical value through implementing desired UX and improving business understanding. I highly value interpersonal relationships and communication.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for program maintenance and development tasks.
Developed, maintained, and rebuilt the Jamong Communications website.
Providing comprehensive technical solutions for web development.

jobs.title: Mentor
description: Served as a mentor at the Honam LLM Hackathon Competition.
Supported participating teams in AI project development and provided technical advice.

jobs.title: Education Program Manager
description: Managed sales and administration of educational programs including online courses.
Handled educational program promotion and customer management tasks.
Provided project mentoring to students.

jobs.title: Financial Software Engineer
description: Responsible for Korea Post insurance system stabilization project.
Resolved complex insurance business issues that arose after next-generation launch.
Participated as a core developer in Korea Post's next-generation construction project.
Responsible for overall development of credit and notification tasks in customer management system.
Designed and implemented over 100 screens and hundreds of programs.
Managed the entire lifecycle from system launch to stabilization.
Performed both SI (System Integration) and SM (System Maintenance) tasks.
Conducted quality management for stable operation of large-scale financial systems.

jobs.title: Financial Software Engineer
description: Responsible for overall CRM system operation and customer data analysis.
Performed VIP customer selection, management, and marketing message distribution.
Managed overall CRM data and marketing strategy development for Kwangju Bank.
Handled FATCA&CRS international tax information management and annual June reporting.
Developed and maintained card marketing programs in collaboration with development companies.
Performed new CRM program development and system maintenance with development companies.

jobs.title: Financial Data Analyst
description: Responsible for credit report data and page management.
Performed data analysis tasks through BI Report system.
Conducted verification work to ensure financial data accuracy and quality.
Improved work efficiency through report automation process improvement.
Supported data-driven decision making through inter-departmental collaboration.

items.title: Jamong Communications Website Development
items.description: Developed Jamong Communications' official website using Next.js and modern web technologies.

items.title: Fullpage Scroll Template
items.description: A full-page scroll portfolio template that works like fullpage.js, providing smooth scroll experience using Embla Carousel and Lenis.

items.title: Simple Clova Chatbot
items.description: A Naver Clova Studio-based chatbot system developed for student mentoring at the Honam LLM Hackathon Competition.

items.title: Harusari
items.description: A daily task management Flutter app using the 1-3-5 productivity method to help users focus on today's tasks.

items.title: eGovFrame Template
items.description: A Korean eGovernment Framework template configured to work with IntelliJ and Gradle environment.

items.title: Haru Todo App
items.description: A daily TODO application with daily reset functionality built with Kotlin for Android.

items.title: Streamer Recommender
items.description: A game streamer recommendation service for multiple platforms including YouTube, Twitch, and Chzzk based on game categories.

items.title: AI Bitcoin
items.description: An OpenAI-based Bitcoin automated trading system deployed on AWS.

items.title: Just Today
items.description: A daily Todo application that automatically resets at a user-defined time each day.

items.title: Hear
items.description: An audiobook web service for visually impaired individuals, providing personalized voice synthesis and book summary features.

items.title: HomeWalk
items.description: A family health management and step tracking application that supports family health goal achievement and communication.

items.title: Java Mini Game Project
items.description: A simple intern training game developed in Java.

items.title: Korea Post Insurance Stabilization
items.description: Korea Post insurance system stabilization, resolving complex insurance business issues that arose after next-generation launch.

items.title: Korea Post Next-Generation Construction Project
items.description: Participated as a core developer in Korea Post's next-generation system construction project, developing customer management systems.

items.title: Kwangju Bank New CRM Project
items.description: Built Kwangju Bank's new CRM system to enhance customer relationship management and data analysis capabilities.

items.title: Kwangju Bank Card Marketing Project
items.description: Developed and maintained Kwangju Bank's card marketing system to support efficient marketing strategy development.

items.title: Kwangju Bank Credit Report Enhancement
items.description: Enhanced Kwangju Bank's credit report system to improve data processing performance and report quality.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Feel free to reach out for questions, inquiries, or collaborations. I'm open to new opportunities and challenges.

on-submit.title: Spam detected
on-submit.description: Please fill out the form correctly without spam. Thank you!

ok.title: Email sent
ok.description: I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an error sending the email. Please try again later.

form.card-description: Please fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

first-name.min: First name must be at least 2 characters.
first-name.max: First name must be less than 50 characters.
first-name.regex: First name must contain only letters.

last-name.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
last-name.max: Last name must be less than 50 characters.
last-name.regex: Last name must contain only letters.

email.email: Email must be a valid email address.
email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters.
email.max: Email must be less than 100 characters.

message.min: Message must be at least 10 characters.
message.max: Message must be less than 500 characters.
